title: Himi 582
lyrics:
7.6.7.6.7.6.7.5.
(“Pea ‘oua na’a fakahu kimautolu
ki he ‘ahi’ahi.” Matiu 6:13)
1.
‘Oku mau ‘ilo, ‘Eiki,
Ko homau nafa ē
Ke hanganaki sivi
He taimi fua pē.
Na’a mo ho’ fanga pele
‘E ‘ikai si’i lakai:
Kae fai pē honau ‘eke,
‘O tō ‘a e ‘ahi’ahi.
2.
Kae ‘oua tuku, ‘Eiki,
Ke fai mālohi fau;
‘O hulu ‘i he ivi
‘E taki taha ma’u.
No’otaki ‘a e Fili na,
Ta’ofi ‘ene ‘ai
Ha tā’e matu’uekina,
Ha tā ‘e ‘ikai tali.
3.
‘Eiki, taʻofi muʻa
‘A ‘emau ala’aki
Ke fou he veiveiua
Ofi he ‘ahi’ahi.
Ka ai ha mei touia,
Sīsū, tokoni ofi;
‘O ‘oua li’ekina
Kae ‘oua pē ke ‘osi.
4.
‘Oku mau faka’amu
Ke ‘oua toe feia
Ha lea, ha fakakaukau,
Ha ngāue ‘oku hia.
Ke tā pe ‘a e tefito,
‘A e aka ‘o e kovi,
‘A e angahala lilo,
‘A e holi ‘oku toi.
5.
‘E Sīsū, na’a Ke pole
Ke fakangata hia.
Ko e halaia kuo mole,
Lava ‘a e vetekina.
Kae ‘ai pē ke ka’anga,
Kae maʻu kotoa mo’ou;
Kae hoko homau anga
Ko e koto fa’u foʻou. *
